DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness InCraft® subject abdominal aortic aneurysm require endovascular repair .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter , Open Label , Prospective , Non-randomized Study InCraft® Stent Graft System Subjects With Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms ( INSPIRATION )
DOC.detailed_description: In US , abdominal aortic aneurysm ( AAA ) find 4-8 % old men 0.5-1.5 % old woman , result 30,000-40,000 elective procedure 1,400 peri-operative death . The significant complication AAA aneurysm sac rupture 15,000 patient die annually 15th lead cause death elderly 60 85 year age . In Japan , estimate approximately 14,000 endovascular aneurysm repair ( EVAR ) open surgical repair case perform year 2010 . Abdominal aortic aneurysm treat three way : ( 1 ) Medical management ; ( 2 ) Open surgical repair ; ( 3 ) Endovascular aneurysm repair ( EVAR ) . EVAR emerge alternative treatment AAA patient . It less invasive open repair carry low rate early mortality morbidity . It also extend treatment option patient undergo conventional surgical procedure due high operative risk . As EVAR technology evolves , allow treatment AAA increase complexity aortic neck access vessel . The InCraft® AAA Stent Graft System design endovascular repair infrarenal AAAs complex aortic anatomy . This stent-graft system utilizes nitinol stent polyester graft technology ultra-low profile delivery system , assist physician deploy device control , consistent , precise manner within aortic neck iliac artery . By isolate aneurysmal sac , system provide alternative blood flow path relieve pressure arterial vessel wall minimize aneurysm growth potential aneurysm sac rupture .
DOC.criteria: Subject must meet ALL follow inclusion criterion enrol study : 1 . Male Female age 20 year old ; 2 . Proximal aortic neck 1731mm diameter ; 3 . Suprarenal aorta , 20mm anticipate landing location , small nominal diameter aortic bifurcate prosthesis use ; 4 . Infrarenal aortic neck ≥10mm length suprarenal infrarenal angulation ≤60° ; 5 . Subject least one following : 1 . AAA size > 5.0 cm ; 2 . Increase AAA diameter > 0.5 cm last 6 month ; 6 . Abdominal treatment length ( low renal artery origin aortic bifurcation ) ≥ 9.4cm ; 7 . Aortic bifurcation > 18mm diameter ; 8 . Iliac land zone ≥15mm length ; 9 . Iliac land zone 722mm diameter ; 10 . Minimum access vessel size ≥ 5mm ; 11 . Minimum overall AAA treatment length ( low renal artery distal land zone ) 128 mm ; 12 . Women child bear potential must nonpregnant , nonlactating , plan become pregnant course trial ; negative urine serum pregnancy test within 7 day prior index procedure ; 13 . Provide write informed consent applicable write HIPAA authorization ( For US site ) prior initiation study procedure ; 14 . Willing comply specify followup evaluation schedule . Subjects exclude ANY follow exclusion criterion apply : 1 . Vascular anatomy placement stentgraft cause occlusion internal iliac artery necessitate surgical occlusion internal iliac artery ; 2 . Subject one following : 1 . Aneurysm sac rupture leak abdominal aortic aneurysm ; 2 . Mycotic , dissecting , inflammatory abdominal aortic aneurysm ; 3 . Clinically significant acute vascular injury due trauma ; 3 . Significant aortic iliac mural thrombus , plaque calcification would compromise fixation seal device ; 4 . A conical aortic neck define > 3mm distal increase 10mm length plan seal zone ; 5 . Thoracic aortic aneurysm ≥45mm ; 6 . Any aortic dissection ; 7 . Morbid obesity ( BMI > 40.0 kg.m2 ) clinical condition limit require imaging study visualization aorta ; 8 . Renal insufficiency ( Creatinine > 2.0mg/dL ) subject renal dialysis ; 9 . Known allergy intolerance nickel titanium ( nitinol ) , Polyethylene terephthalate ( PET ) , polytetrafluoroethylene ( PTFE ) ; 10 . Known contraindication undergo angiography anticoagulation ( e.g . contrast allergy treat ) ; 11 . Connective tissue disorder ( Marfan 's Syndrome EhlersDanlos Syndrome ) ; 12 . Coagulopathy , bleed disorder , hypercoagulable state ; 13 . Organ transplant recipient subject require systemic immunosuppressant therapy ; 14 . Cerebral vascular accident ( CVA ) , MI , intracranial bleeding within 3 month prior procedure ; 15 . Active infection chronic systemic illness time index procedure may interfere study objective ; 16 . Major surgical procedure within 1 month prior index procedure preplanned within 1 month afterwards ; 17 . Coexisting condition life expectancy le 2 year time procedure ; 18 . Current planned participation investigational drug medical device clinical study complete primary endpoint ( ) evaluation ; 19 . Existing AAA surgical graft and/or AAA stentgraft system ; 20 . Other medical , social , psychological issue opinion investigator preclude subject receive treatment , procedure evaluation pre posttreatment .
